sentences.en: Anxin wood securities said that overall, industry affected by the macro - economic contraction.
sentences.cn: 安信证券表示,整体来看, 行业受到宏观经济收缩的影响不大.

sentences.en: Before the SEC was created in 1934, securities were regulated by the individual states.
sentences.cn: 这个委员会是1934年设立的, 在这以前证券交易由各个州调控.

sentences.en: Bonds borrowed through the securities lending system of an over - the - counter securities market.
sentences.cn: 自证券柜台买卖中心借券系统借入者.

sentences.en: Half of them owned public securities.
sentences.cn: 他们之中有一半人有公债券.

sentences.en: He traded in securities and became rich.
Her money is tied up in securities and is not available to her at present.
sentences.cn: 她的钱用来买了股票,目前她还不能支用.

sentences.en: In addition, we hold two point two billion dollars'worth of investment securities.
sentences.cn: 另外我行持有价值22亿美元的证券投资.

sentences.en: Its shares are traded on the Unlisted Securities Market.
sentences.cn: 那家公司的股票在场外证券市场交易。

sentences.en: National banks can package their own mortgages and underwrite them as securities.
sentences.cn: 国家银行可以组合包装自己的的抵押贷款,以证券形式承销。

sentences.en: One could deposit and lend securities.
Short-term securities can also be held as part of an investment portfolio.
sentences.cn: 投资组合里也可以包括短期有价证券。

sentences.en: That business includes securities underwriting, stock and bond trading and merger advice.
sentences.cn: 投资银行业务包括证券承销 、 股票和债券交易以及提供并购建议.

sentences.en: The central bank will provide special loans, and the banks will pledge the land as security.
sentences.cn: 中央银行将提供特别贷款,而各家银行将以土地作为抵押品。

sentences.en: The Commission also regulates interstate market securities and enforces laws against unfair and illegal practices.
sentences.cn: 委员会还负责管理州际市场的证券,并对不公平和非法行为实行法律制裁.

sentences.en: The strips of paper have been subpoenaed by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.cn: 证券交易委员会也在索要这些碎纸.

sentences.en: Their finance ministry is still trying to put a lid on the long-simmering securities scandal.
sentences.cn: 他们的财政部仍在试图遮掩一触即发的证券丑闻。

sentences.en: We provide full securities to all the campers 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 我们全程24小时全方位保障.

words.tran_cn: [金融]有价证券；担保；抵押物（security的复数）；保证人

phrases.tran_cn: n. 中国银河证券有限责任公司
上市证券；交易所挂牌证券
已发行的证券（债券），已发证券

trans.tran_cn: 有价证券，安全( security的名词复数 )，保证，担保，有价证券
trans.tran_en: If something is security for a loan, you promise to give that thing to the person who lends you money, if you fail to pay the money back
